Title: Karma
Writer: Carter Bays (creator), Craig Thomas (creator), Stephen Lloyd, Craig Gerard (story), Matthew Zinman (story), Daniel Gregor (story), Doug Mand (story)
Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders, Neil Patrick Harris
Plot: Barney gets played and heart-broken over a stripper named "Karma," Robin becomes bored with her life on Long Island with Marshall and Lily, while Ted searches for a hobby to fill the empty space in Robin's old room.
